overview: Wendy Stabler is an Entrepreneur and the Owner/Operator of Consulting by W, she is one of the top industry consultant focusing on lead generation, inside sales, B2C, and dialer technology for B2B companies. Wendy has more than 18 years of experience in accounting, marketing, sales, and developmental management. She has most recently added social media marketing to her list of accomplishments! Wendy is a writing expert, she is presently writing and doing copy writing work, for several companies. She has been nominated for several blogging awards and is in the process of making a documentary as well as writing and publishing several books.
